headline: A Look at Darden Restaurants’s Valuation Following Strong Q1 Earnings and Upbeat 2026 Guidance
summary: If you have been following Darden Restaurants (DRI), the company’s recent move should have your attention. Darden just reported its first quarter earnings, showing both sales and net income on the rise compared to a year ago. In addition, management issued guidance expecting further sales and earnings growth into 2026. For investors weighing their next move, these developments are hard to ignore, especially with a new quarterly dividend affirmation and share buybacks possibly boosting...

headline: Darden price target lowered to $210 from $230 at Raymond James
summary: Raymond James lowered the firm’s price target on Darden (DRI) to $210 from $230 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. Darden’s Q1 results came in below elevated expectations, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm thinks the company can sustain solidly positive comps and market share gains over the next several quarters.
